description: The leg is severed below the knee. The target suffers 2d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness Test or fall Unconscious. The lower leg is permanently lost.

title: Leg Severed at Hip
description: The entire leg is severed at the hip. The femoral artery sprays blood everywhere. The target must pass a Hard (-20) Toughness Test or die. Survivors suffer critical Blood Loss.

title: Leg Split Apart
description: The leg is split open from hip to ankle, the blade carving through bone and artery alike. The target dies from catastrophic blood loss.

title: Shallow Cut
description: A thin cut along the leg that bleeds but causes no lasting harm. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue.

title: Sliced Calf
description: A cut to the calf muscle hampers movement. The target's Movement is reduced by half for 1d5 rounds.

title: Hamstrung
description: The blade cuts into the back of the knee. The target falls Prone, suffers 2 levels of Fatigue, and their Movement is halved for 1d10 rounds.

title: Severed Tendons
description: Tendons in the leg are cut. The target falls Prone, suffers 1d5 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and the leg is Useless until surgically repaired.

title: Deep Thigh Wound
description: A deep cut into the thigh severs muscle. The target is Stunned for 1 round, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and the leg is Useless until treated.

title: Severed Toes
description: Several toes are sliced off. The target is Stunned for 1d5 rounds, suffers 2d5 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and permanently loses 1d5 toes. Movement is permanently reduced.

title: Foot Severed
description: The foot is cut off at the ankle. The target is Stunned for 1d10 rounds, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and permanently loses the foot.

title: Leg Severed Below Knee

title: Blast Concussion
description: The shockwave rattles the target's skull. They suffer 1 level of Fatigue and are Deafened for 1 round.

title: Shell Shocked
description: The blast leaves the target disoriented and dazed. They are Stunned for 1 round and Deafened for 1d5 rounds.

title: Shrapnel Cuts
description: Fragments pepper the target's face and scalp. They suffer 2 levels of Fatigue and a -10 penalty to Perception Tests for 1d10 rounds from blood and debris in their eyes.

title: Ruptured Eardrums
description: The concussive blast ruptures both eardrums. The target is Stunned for 1d5 rounds, permanently Deafened, and suffers 1d5 levels of Fatigue.

title: Shrapnel to the Face
description: A large fragment embeds in the target's face. They are Stunned for 1d10 rounds, suffer 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and a permanent -20 penalty to Fellowship Tests from scarring.

title: Eye Destroyed by Shrapnel
description: A fragment destroys one eye. The target is Stunned for 1d10 rounds, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and permanently loses one eye.

title: Jaw Blown Off
description: The lower jaw is torn away by the blast. The target falls Unconscious, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and permanently cannot speak without augmetic replacement. Must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness Test or die.

title: Skull Fragmented
description: The blast shatters the skull, driving bone fragments into the brain. The target falls Unconscious and must pass a Hard (-20) Toughness Test or die. Survivors suffer permanent 1d10 reduction to Intelligence and Perception.

title: Face Blown Apart
description: The entire face is destroyed by the explosion, leaving a crater of shattered bone and pulped tissue. The target must pass a Very Hard (-30) Toughness Test or die instantly. Survivors are blind, deaf, and mute.

title: Head Explodes
description: The target's head detonates in a shower of bone, brain, and blood. They are irrevocably dead. Nearby allies must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or suffer 1d5 Insanity Points.

title: Stinging Fragments
description: Small shrapnel fragments pepper the arm. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue.

title: Shrapnel Cuts
description: Multiple small fragments embed in the arm. The target suffers a -10 penalty to Tests using this arm for 1d5 rounds.

title: Blast Sprain
description: The concussive force wrenches the arm painfully. The target drops anything held and suffers a -20 penalty to Tests using this arm for 1d10 rounds.

title: Embedded Shrapnel
description: Large fragments embed deep in the arm. The target drops anything held, suffers 2 levels of Fatigue, and the arm is Useless until treated as the shrapnel is removed.

title: Shattered Hand
description: The blast destroys the hand in a spray of bone and meat. The target is Stunned for 1 round, suffers 1d5 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and permanently loses the hand.

title: Forearm Shattered
description: The bones of the forearm are shattered by the blast. The target is Stunned for 1d5 rounds, suffers 2d5 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and the arm is Useless. Requires augmetic replacement.

title: Arm Mangled by Blast
description: The explosion tears the arm to shreds. The target is Stunned for 1d10 rounds, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and the arm is permanently destroyed.

title: Arm Blown Off
description: The arm is blasted clean off at the elbow. The target suffers 2d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, falls Unconscious, and the arm is permanently gone.

title: Arm Destroyed by Blast
description: The entire arm is obliterated by the explosion, leaving a ragged stump at the shoulder. The target must pass a Hard (-20) Toughness Test or die from shock and blood loss.

title: Arm Vaporised
description: The arm simply ceases to exist in the blast. The shockwave ruptures organs on that side of the body. The target must pass a Very Hard (-30) Toughness Test or die instantly.

title: Peppered with Fragments
description: Shrapnel peppers the torso, causing numerous small wounds. The target suffers a -10 penalty to Agility Tests for 1d5 rounds.

title: Blast Knockdown
description: The explosion hurls the target to the ground. They fall Prone, are knocked back 1d5 metres, and suffer 2 levels of Fatigue.

title: Deep Shrapnel Wounds
description: Large fragments embed deep in the torso. The target suffers 1d5 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and a -10 penalty to Agility and Toughness Tests until treated.

title: Cracked Ribs from Blast
description: The concussive force cracks several ribs. The target is Stunned for 1 round, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, and a -20 penalty to Agility Tests. Blood Loss from shrapnel wounds.

title: Perforated Abdomen
description: Multiple fragments penetrate the abdomen. The target is Stunned for 1d5 rounds, suffers 2d5 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and a -20 penalty to Toughness Tests until treated.

title: Organs Ruptured
description: The blast ruptures internal organs. The target falls Unconscious, suffers 1d10 levels of Fatigue, Blood Loss, and must pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness Test or die from internal haemorrhaging.

title: Chest Blown Open
description: The blast tears open the chest cavity, exposing the ribcage and organs. The target falls Unconscious, suffers critical Blood Loss, and must pass a Hard (-20) Toughness Test or die.

title: Torso Shredded
description: The explosion tears the torso apart, shredding organs and shattering the spine. The target must pass a Very Hard (-30) Toughness Test or die instantly. Even survivors are permanently crippled with -20 to Toughness, Strength, and Agility.

title: Body Destroyed
description: The target's torso is blown apart by the explosion. Fragments of bone, organs, and armour scatter across the area. They die instantly. Nearby allies must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or suffer 1d5 Insanity Points.

title: Blasted Kneecap
